# tidyplus

## Introduction

`tidyplus` provides functions such as
[`str_crush()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/str_crush.md),
[`add_missing_column()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/add_missing_column.md),
[`coalesce_data()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/coalesce_data.md)
and
[`drop_na_all()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/drop_na_all.md)
that complement ‘tidyverse’ functionality or functions that provide
alternative behaviors such as
[`if_else2()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/if_else2.md)
and
[`str_detect2()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/str_detect2.md).

## Installation

You can install the development version of `tidyplus` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/poissonconsulting/tidyplus) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("poissonconsulting/tidyplus")
```

## Code of Conduct

Please note that the tidyplus project is released with a [Contributor
Code of
Conduct](https://contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.html).
By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`add_missing_column()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/add_missing_column.md)
  : Add missing columns to a data frame
- [`coalesce_data()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/coalesce_data.md)
  : Coalesce Data
- [`collapse_comments()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/collapse_comments.md)
  : Collapse Comments
- [`drop_na_all()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/drop_na_all.md)
  : Drop rows containing all missing values
- [`drop_uninformative_columns()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/drop_uninformative_columns.md)
  : Drop uninformative columns from a data frame
- [`duplicates()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/duplicates.md)
  : Keep non-unique rows in a data frame
- [`if_else2()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/if_else2.md)
  : Vectorised if else.
- [`only()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/only.md)
  : Extract the only distinct value from a vector
- [`replace_na_if()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/replace_na_if.md)
  : Conditional replacement of NAs with specified values
- [`str_crush()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/str_crush.md)
  : Remove whitespace from a string
- [`str_detect2()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/str_detect2.md)
  : Detect the presence/absence of a match
- [`str_replace_vec()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/str_replace_vec.md)
  : String replace multiple strings
- [`str_to_snake_case()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/str_to_snake_case.md)
  : Converts strings to Snake Case
- [`summarise2()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/summarise2.md)
  [`summarize2()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/summarise2.md)
  : Summarise Each Group Down to One Row
- [`unite_str()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/tidyplus/reference/unite_str.md)
  : Unite multiple character columns into one
